Totally with you girl..  I am with 2 month old girl and almost 3 year old boy all day and alone when my husband's gone to work.. it's a lot of juggling.  I used to try to do everything around the house and keep up all day but then I realized that I get burnt out and exhausted after running around without any break.  So now, I'm trying to go easier on myself and try to enjoy the time with the kids and get some shut eye or yoga stretch when kids are napping to re-energize myself.  Housework can wait till later.. Self care is definitely a huge priority especially as a mom because we need the energy to take care our little ones!  Love these type of vlogs :)

I like ur sentence about sage being your priority !!! Very well done !!! I was so hard on myself with my first kid and wanted t make sure everything was perfect and organized but trust me if you re rested and take care of yourself first this will impact positively and all the rest of your memenbers !!! It’s the best time investment ever !! You will c !! Things would get harder once they grow , but u will appreciate every second of it !!! Good luck Nicole !! Kisses from Montréal
